seo: 大华,CVE_2019_3948,漏洞检测,信息泄露
summary: 该插件用于检测大华设备是否存在CVE-2019-3948漏洞，通过利用该漏洞获取设备的软件版本信息，可能导致信息泄露。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether Dahua devices have the CVE-2019-3948 vulnerability. By exploiting this vulnerability, the software version information of the device can be obtained, which may lead to information leakage.
